ruleExplore.author: .s-name@text##(.*) .*##$1
ruleExplore.bookUrl:
@js:
bid = String(java.getElements("a").attr("href")).match(/shuku\/(.*)\//)[1];//提取出来数据
java.put("bid",bid);//目录页代码替换，让目录页调用此参数
"https://api-miao.qimao.com/api/book/chapter-list?book_id=" + bid
ruleExplore.name: .s-tit@a@text

ruleSearch.author: .s-txt@a@text##(.*)\n.*##$1
ruleSearch.bookUrl:
@js:
bid = String(java.getElements("a").attr("href")).match(/shuku\/(.*)\//)[1];//提取出来数据
java.put("bid",bid);//目录页代码替换，让目录页调用此bid参数
"https://api-miao.qimao.com/api/book/chapter-list?book_id=" + bid
ruleSearch.name: .s-tit@a@text

ruleToc.chapterUrl:
@js:
bid = java.get("bid");//调用发现页bid参数
cid = java.getString("$.id");//调用本页自带id参数
"https://miao.qimao.com/shuku/" + bid + "-" + cid + "/"
